translations: n．服装，衣着：指人们穿着的衣物，包括各种款式、颜色和材质。
· The guests arrived in their finest attires.
客人们穿着最华丽的服装到达。
v．穿着，打扮：为某种场合或目的而穿戴特定的衣物。

sentences.sentence: Performers must be in neat and suitable attires.
People in the bars were dressed in all sorts of ghostly attires .
sentences.translation: 酒吧里的人都把自己打扮成鬼鬼怪怪的样子。
